summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6685 for the improvement of the alley in Block 2, Buckius Addition, being the alley in the Block bounded by 27th Avenue, East Pike St., Empire Way and East Union Street; by paving, etc., under Ordinance No. 106236, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
